pullrequest.title: Explicitly set the cmake_minimum_required policy version for package config files

content.raw:
We can add a regression test shell script for unix systems that greps for that line between those three files and fails if they aren't the same

~~~
grep -h '^cmake_minimum_required' \
    ../CMakeLists.txt \
    ../cmake/ignition-config.cmake.in \
    ../config/ignition-cmake-config.cmake.in \
  | uniq -c \
  | awk '{ if ($1 != "3") { exit 1 }}'
~~~
